name: The Forever War 0.1
description:
A King once ruled the Galaxy in Peace. Two sons, driven by greed killed the king and split the galaxy in two. The two brothers could never agree on who gets what so a forever war has split the Galaxy.  You a nobody, decides to take matters into his own hand a start a Third Faction.  As you go from Planet to Planet conquering and Freeing everything you will be joined by various Allies who seek to end the war.

Thank you for testing. Please Feel Free to Provide Feedback. Will Be updating Often as I love this project. Will be pushing out Dev Logs with Photos so make sure to follow the Project! 

Controls 

  • WASD Movement
  • A or D + Spacebar = Roll In Direction of Movement
  • Leftclick (press or Hold) Primary Fire at Targeting system.
  • Z To Boost (Returns a static position and not pre boosted position )
  • J key Calls Ally 1 To fight Beside you. (If he takes damage or gets hurt you take the damage)

Green are Collectables/Upgrades

Yellow Objects are Destroyable Objects.
